name: YouTube Disinfectant
description: ‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú® ‚ú® Removes all the brain numbing information from YouTube video pages ‚ú® ‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú® ‚ö†Ô∏è Important note Remember to disable "Up next" before installing (see here for more info) üö´ What gets hidden/disabled * Related list, subscribe button and end screen ‚Äì blocks AI from trying to get you hooked. * View/Like/Dislike counters ‚Äì influences perception of quality. * Subscriber count ‚Äì influences perception of legitimacy. * Action buttons ‚Äì no more subscribing, liking or disliking to feed the machine.
